text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
—— I've been contemplating. Composition, outfits, expressions, 
lighting… Will photos created with everything planned out really 
be the absolute best?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
It will certainly produce beautiful photos. My thoughts have 
not changed on that, but for the resort's PR photos, I felt that 
there is something needed beyond that……

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
And… yesterday, when I went down 
the slide with Cheval, I was convinced.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Photos where we are thinking from the bottom of our hearts 
"this is fun", versus "smile for the camera". Which ones will 
make people wish to come here… you understand, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
That's why we are changing course from here on! 
No more instructions for specific expression or poses. 
The stage will be set, so just enjoy your time at the resort!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
—— This might have been my first time watching a ballet movie 
at a theater… The atmosphere was so intense.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …ble.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
This is incredible, Cheval! That was a famous classical ballet, 
but it has hardly ever been adapted to film…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Even so, it's a true masterpiece so many people have taken on and refined over time! To think I got to see it. The person in charge here… they get it!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Furthermore, even though it's just for the photo shoot, 
to be able to watch in a reserved theater at full volume…! 
To be given such luxury… I'm so glad… that I came here…!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Shion's expression… I'm sure she isn't acting or playing it up. 
It's coming from the bottom of her heart…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(…This is what Crown wanted to capture… 
The beauty of true feelings, straight from the heart…!)

text_block_list.name: Bartender
text_block_list.text:
—— This is from the guest over there. 
A "Creek Harbour Sunset" for you.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Waaah～ it's so pretty～! Doesn't it look like something 
a bar at the Dubai Marina would have!?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Yes. It seems to be a mocktail that turns carrot juice 
into a likeness of the shimmering sea painted by the 
sunset over Creek Harbour.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Yaaaaaay～! Don't I look like a celeb with this? Don't I? 
In fact, I'm definitely already a celeb, right!?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
—— It is what I would expect of the Satono Group… 
This fitness facility is entirely created by repurposing 
Uma-lator technology?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
That's right, the one provided to the school was fitted 
with race simulation functionality, but this one here is 
more geared towards entertainment.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
The claims might be a little exaggerated… but you can 
compete in classic resort activities with horsegirl athletes 
from all eras and regions. For example ——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …A hot spring, and ping pong.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Hot springs are a staple of Japanese resorts… and a hot spring 
has to have… this, right? There's a wide selection of opponents 
as well, from beginners to world-class medallists.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
I see… Even some of my family's strongest are included. 
I welcome this type of design. It will… let me fight with 
everything I have.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(Hehe… This is it! Even though it's just virtual space, she looks 
just like she's about to give her all against a real opponent! 
That wraps up this shot perfectly!)

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Shion and Cheval. I have a small request… 
Keep it between us though.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Eh? W-What is it?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
I want a shot of Vivlos' surprised face. I will have her 
play on a floatie for the shoot soon, and I'll leave it 
to you both to surprise her♪

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
…Ah, I see, like a prank. If you think that would be 
great content for a photo, I don't mind helping out.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Target spotted. We'll dive under here and approach on both sides simul—— hm?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Th-Th-Th-Theeaye…… There… There's a fin… A fin……!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Fin…… ? Wait —— 
Hol-Hold on, why's something like that here…… !?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
A shark!? A dolphin!? 
A… A-A-A-A-A-A-Anyways, we gotta escape……!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh☆ Dolphin drone initialised! 
Go, go!

text_block_list.name: Cheval & Shion
text_block_list.text: Wah! Gyah!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh☆ Both of you relaxed too early♪ 
You can't let your guard down… until the prank's over☆

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
But to think they'd make dolphin drones of this 
size… the Satono Group's big toys are incredible☆ 
This is so much fun♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
(I'm so sorry. I wanted to capture Vivlos' most 
lively expression, and you two were the perfect 
reverse prank subjects……!)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Haa… Vivlos really looks like she was enjoying herself. Shion and I were trying so hard to escape we could've ran on top of the sea.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hehehe. But thanks to you, we managed to capture great moments from everyone.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text:
Of course, that includes you, Cheval. Anyone who sees your 
facial expressions would wish to come here, which makes for 
great advertising.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
In these photos… I'm smiling, surprised, and all sorts 
of things are going on. I didn't know I could make 
these kinds of expressions.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Somehow, it's a little unnerving…… but I don't hate it.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Heh, you'll be alright. No, it's fine to remain feeling that way.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
—— Is that… so. 
…………I see.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: …Hehe. Yes. You, as you are now, really are the best photo model.
